Name: Base Station License, Approval, Cadman Express Car & Limo, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Cadman Express Car & Limousine Service Inc., also known as Cadman Express Car and Limo, Inc., also known as Cadman Express Car & Limo Svc Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Cadman Express Car & Limousine Service Inc., also known as Cadman Express Car and Limo, Inc., also known as Cadman Express Car & Limo Svc Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 78 Henry Street in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#3421
